::: {#dabb0942 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd df = pd.read_csv('airquality_datasets.csv') ``` ::: ::: {#f7973d21 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} df.info() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` RangeIndex: 153 entries, 0 to 152 Data columns (total 6 columns): # Column Non-Null Count Dtype --- ------ -------------- ----- 0 Ozone 116 non-null float64 1 Solar.R 146 non-null float64 2 Wind 153 non-null float64 3 Temp 153 non-null int64 4 Month 153 non-null int64 5 Day 153 non-null int64 dtypes: float64(3), int64(3) memory usage: 7.3 KB ``` ::: ::: ::: {#acbfdf50 .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} df.describe() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ```{=html}
Ozone Solar.R Wind Temp Month Day
count 116.000000 146.000000 153.000000 153.000000 153.000000 153.000000
mean 42.129310 185.931507 9.957516 77.882353 6.993464 15.803922
std 32.987885 90.058422 3.523001 9.465270 1.416522 8.864520
min 1.000000 7.000000 1.700000 56.000000 5.000000 1.000000
25% 18.000000 115.750000 7.400000 72.000000 6.000000 8.000000

max 168.000000 334.000000 20.700000 97.000000 9.000000 31.000000
``` ::: ::: ::: {#551c1ac1 .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} import matplotlib.pyplot as plt ``` ::: ::: {#55ee4646 .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Ozone Histogram plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6)) plt.hist(df['Ozone'].dropna(), bins=20, color='blue', edgecolor='black') plt.title('Distribution of Ozone Levels') plt.xlabel('Ozone (ppb)') plt.ylabel('Frequency') plt.savefig('hist_ozone_jaen.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](Tut3_Python_Jaen_files/figure-html/cell-6-output-1.png){width=667 height=523} ::: ::: ::: {#d9d7efc8 .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Temp Histogram plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6)) plt.hist(df['Temp'].dropna(), bins=20, color='orange', edgecolor='black') plt.title('Distribution of Temperature') plt.xlabel('Temperature (째F)') plt.ylabel('Frequency') plt.savefig('hist_temp_jaen.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](Tut3_Python_Jaen_files/figure-html/cell-7-output-1.png){width=672 height=523} ::: ::: ::: {#a2dfafe5 .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Boxplot for Ozone plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6)) plt.boxplot(df['Ozone'].dropna()) plt.title('Boxplot of Ozone Levels') plt.ylabel('Ozone (ppb)') plt.savefig('boxplot_ozone_jaen.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](Tut3_Python_Jaen_files/figure-html/cell-8-output-1.png){width=668 height=505} ::: ::: ::: {#c76f34a1 .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} import seaborn as sns ``` ::: ::: {#3996e4e8 .cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Scatter plot Ozone vs Temp plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6)) sns.scatterplot(x='Temp', y='Ozone', hue='Month', data=df) plt.title('Temperature vs Ozone Levels by Month') plt.xlabel('Temperature (째F)') plt.ylabel('Ozone (ppb)') plt.savefig('scatter_tempvsozone_jaen.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](Tut3_Python_Jaen_files/figure-html/cell-10-output-1.png){width=816 height=523} ::: ::: ::: {#f56b1967 .cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} df['Month'] = df['Month'].astype('category') ``` ::: ::: {#ce860c30 .cell execution_count=11} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Scatter plot Ozone vs Temp, better VIZ for categorical plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6)) sns.scatterplot(x='Temp', y='Ozone', hue='Month', data=df) plt.title('Temperature vs Ozone Levels by Month') plt.xlabel('Temperature (째F)') plt.ylabel('Ozone (ppb)') plt.savefig('scatter_tempvsozone2_jaen.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](Tut3_Python_Jaen_files/figure-html/cell-12-output-1.png){width=816 height=523} ::: ::: ::: {#228ea559 .cell execution_count=12} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Convert the numeric month to the month name df['month_name'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Month'], format='%m').dt.strftime('%B') print(df) # to see our new variable added to the dataframe ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Ozone Solar.R Wind Temp Month Day month_name 0 41.0 190.0 7.4 67 5 1 May 1 36.0 118.0 8.0 72 5 2 May 2 12.0 149.0 12.6 74 5 3 May 3 18.0 313.0 11.5 62 5 4 May 4 NaN NaN 14.3 56 5 5 May .. ... ... ... ... ... ... ... 148 30.0 193.0 6.9 70 9 26 September 149 NaN 145.0 13.2 77 9 27 September 150 14.0 191.0 14.3 75 9 28 September 151 18.0 131.0 8.0 76 9 29 September 152 20.0 223.0 11.5 68 9 30 September [153 rows x 7 columns] ``` ::: ::: ::: {#07b13569 .cell execution_count=13} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Scatter plot Ozone vs Temp, better names and hue plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6)) sns.scatterplot(x='Temp', y='Ozone', hue='month_name', data=df) plt.title('Temperature vs Ozone Levels by Month') plt.xlabel('Temperature (째F)') plt.ylabel('Ozone (ppb)') plt.savefig('scatter_tempvsozone3_jaen.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](Tut3_Python_Jaen_files/figure-html/cell-14-output-1.png){width=816 height=523} ::: ::: ::: {#72d8237c .cell execution_count=14} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Correlation matrix corr = df[['Ozone', 'Temp', 'Wind']].corr() sns.heatmap(corr, annot=True, cmap='coolwarm') plt.title('Correlation Matrix') plt.savefig('correlation_matrix_jaen.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](Tut3_Python_Jaen_files/figure-html/cell-15-output-1.png){width=544 height=431} ::: :::
